name: NKLibrary
desc: An instance of the NKLibrary class represents the library of issues for a newsstand content application. DeprecatedUse remote notifications to download content silently in the background. For information, see Pushing Background Updates to Your App.

items.name: class func shared() -> NKLibrary?
items.desc: Returns the shared instance representing the newsstand content library.

items.name: func addIssue(withName: String, date: Date) -> NKIssue
items.desc: Creates a newsstand issue and adds it to the content library.

items.name: var currentlyReadingIssue: NKIssue?
items.desc: Accesses or sets the newsstand issue that the user is currently reading.

items.name: func removeIssue(NKIssue)
items.desc: Removes the specified issue from the newsstand content library.

items.name: func issue(withName: String) -> NKIssue?
items.desc: Returns an issue of the newsstand content library specified by name.

items.name: var issues: [NKIssue]
items.desc: Returns the current issues of the newsstand content library.

items.name: var downloadingAssets: [NKAssetDownload]
items.desc: The assets that are currently being downloaded for one or more issues of the newsstand content library.
